content:
Dark Times The past few weeks have been difficult for me, both emotionally and physically. It is hard to stay positive when the source of your unhappiness are things outside of your control. When I heard about the bounty program hosted by cartesi, i was motivated and excited, as it gave me something to look forward to, a healthy distraction that would only improve my skills as a developer.
Cartesi is a new technology for the web3 space that allows for application-specific rollups with a Linux runtime. From how i understand it, it allows you to take certain tasks of the blockchain and run it in the cartesi virtual machine, making it faster and cheaper, plus it allows development of Decentralized applications with a more familiar tech stack like javascript or python, rather than writing raw solidity, thereby improving the developer experience problem
solution
conclusion
summary: i gave up on a project and a bounty program held by cartesi
title: I-Gave-Up-Today

Background I was born in Abuja, Nigeria. Studied at Nigerian Turkish International College or NTIC (now Nigerian ‘Tulip’ Int’l College). Obtained a bachelor’s degree in Pharmaceutical sciences from the University of Nigeria, Nsukka (UNN), currently a pharmacy intern in Nigeria.
My Passion Learning is a strong passion of mine, I love learning new things, both in the tech world and in the health space, and using that knowledge to help people and solve real problems.
Pharmacist I have a B.sc in Pharmacy, and currently work as an intern pharmacist. I love the innovation in the pharmaceutical industry and aspire to contribute to the sector with my knowledge and skills with technology and programming.
Programmer I’ve committed myself to the autodidact lifestyle that is required to be a software developer, studying intensely, writing code, and optimizing it to solve problems more efficiently.
Family I’m a son to the best parents a guy could ask for, a brother to two lovely gentlemen, and a friend to many.
Skills Languages: Typescript/Javascript, Python, C, Bash, PHP, Go Frameworks: express, Django, Svelte, Hugo, Svelte, React, Bootstrap, Tailwindcss Graphic design: Photoshop, Corel-draw, lunacy, Pixellab, Canva etc. Soft skills: problem-solving, Communication, Leadership. Hobbies I love reading, whether it be fiction, academia, non-fiction, history. A big music fan Close up magic Anime Fitness
